Comments_List: The courses touches on so many subjects within Ecology and incorporates quantitative ecology well.

The assignments were very helpful and I liked the lab reports although I thought that with the level of effort they wanted from lab reports, that they would be a greater proportion of our overall grade. I also wanted more of the quantitative material to be on the lecture slides for reference. Some of it is done on the board so if you miss a class or write something down wrong, it's not on the lecture slides that are posted so there's nothing to reference.
